P

PickupGame - Class in <Unnamed>
Simulates game of pickup.
Create an object, then use the play method to simulate a game.
PickupGame myGame = new PickupGame();
myGame.play(someScanner);
PickupGame() - Constructor for class PickupGame
Constructs a game with a random number of stones and play mode.
PickupGame(int) - Constructor for class PickupGame
Constructs a game with the given initial stones and random play mode.
PickupGame(int, PickupGame.PlayMode) - Constructor for class PickupGame
Constructs a game with the given stones and playmode.
PickupGame.PlayMode - Enum in <Unnamed>
The play mode for the computer.
PickupGameTester - Class in <Unnamed>
Tests the object PickupGame for proper functionality.
